channel.title: Making a safe zone wilderness help

item.title: Making a safe zone wilderness help
item.dc:creator: @jake2624 jake2624
item.description:
@jake2624 wrote:

if you want to make a safe area then go into your client.java and search for: public boolean nonWild
Then you will see something like this bellow: || (absX >= 2685 && absX <= 2705 && absY >= 3200 && absY <= 3221) || (absX >= 2685 && absX <= 2705 && absY >= 3200 && absY <= 3221) || (absX >= 2685 && absX <= 2705 && absY >= 3200 && absY <= 3221)

under the first one add this and change to coords to the area you want safe. (don’t include the west,east,south and north parts. Neither the line underneath them.) [code] West East South North
---- ---- ----- -----

	|| (absX >= 0000 && absX <= 0000 && absY >= 0000 && absY <= 0000)[/code]

but if you want it wildly you need to find the one which covers the safe area and change it to the cord you want.
Hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: Making a safe zone wilderness help

item.title: Making a safe zone wilderness help
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“MkDallas, post:4, topic:286349”][quote author=Dopple link=topic=378702.msg2848341#msg2848341 date=1246400184]

public boolean isInWilderness_PVP(){//Player verses player if(isInArea(2944, 3967, 3327, 3520))return true;//Above ground wilderness if(!isInArea(2944, 3967, 3327, 3520))return false; return false; }
Just remove the code that makes it safe wildy.
Its common scense think.
That code is just making it safe if you remove guess what its wildy!

How can I make a safe zone into a pkzone?
I think I need to add coords to the isInWilderness code above right?
And can someone get the code ready for me? Like true false idk.

[/quote]
No it doesn’t.[/quote]
You want it wildy or want it safe?

Read full topic
